Evanesco Offline

Evanesco OfflineÔÉÅ

Fully local/offline document anonymization (OCR + spaCy/regex + optional Ollama GPT-OSS).

This documentation covers installation, quick start, the Gradio UI, and the Python APIs for embedding Evanesco into your applications.
